attributes.action: Increase Safety on Rural Roads in Memory of Abbey and Bradley
attributes.additional_details:
On the 16/09/12 Abbey Parker, 17 and Bradley Cooper, 18 were killed in a motorbike accident involving two tractors leaving many devastated.
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-18840110

There are several ways in which road safety can be improved and maybe with the below proposed changes Abbey and Bradley would still be here today.

Proposed changes:
Strategic placement and increased turning radius of field entrances
Lower speed limit for single carriageway rural roads from 60mph to 40mph
Maintenance of hedges and trees adjacent to roads
Introduction of speed cameras on rural roads to enforce the speed limit changes

Please sign this petition and make people aware by sharing it on Facebook, Twitter, email or anyway you can. Thank you
